alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pike, southwestern Monroe, Upson and southern Lamar Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sunset Village, or near Thomaston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Yatesville, Culloden, Aldora, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Atwater, Goggins, Redbone Crossroads, Russellville, Brent, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Crest, Redbone, Sunnyside, Hannahs Mill, Collier and Piedmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
